body_html:
My concerns are exactly your caveats :-)

  • The classifiers minimise the size of the distro
  • They keep everything in the maven "world" - native libraries and JVM classes. Which means that builds can be fully controlled through maven (without manual processes for installation of libraries).

Am I allowed to submit a PR for this? I can help fix this.

body:
My concerns are exactly your caveats :-)
* The classifiers minimise the size of the distro
* They keep everything in the maven "world" - native libraries and JVM classes. Which means that builds can be fully controlled through maven (without manual processes for installation of libraries).

Am I allowed to submit a PR for this? I can help fix this.
